mapper.select: select taskid, orderid, subsiteid, shipname, shiptel, shippro, shipcity, shipdis, billname, billtel, billpro, billcity, billdis, courier, totalprice, status, note from taskfrom where orderid = #{orderId}

select taskid, orderid, subsiteid, shipname, shiptel, shippro, shipcity, shipdis, billname, billtel, billpro, billcity, billdis, courier, totalprice, status, note from taskfrom where taskid = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into taskform (taskid, orderid, subsiteid, shipname, shiptel, shippro, shipcity, shipdis, billname, billtel, billpro, billcity, billdis, courier, totalprice, status, note) values (#{taskid}, #{orderId}, #{subsiteId}, #{shipname}, #{shiptel}, #{shippro}, #{shipcity}, #{shipdis}, #{billname}, #{billtel}, #{billpro}, #{billcity}, #{billdis}, #{courier}, #{totalprice}, #{status}, #{note})
